overview: Since 2012, The Harlem Veteran Project has dedicated their time to recording and preserving the stories of American Veterans.  Through this process the students have learned the long term impact of war on individuals and the community.  In 2016, the Harlem Veteran Project students took an extended look into the impact war had on veterans, Jim Thew and Alex Feggestad.  During this journey the students learned the reality of war and Jim and Alex experienced the power of healing through oral history.
title: The Monster Within
